```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F, message = F, warning = F)
``` 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
hospital.beds <- read_csv("data/hospital_beds.csv") %>% 
  select(-`Series Name`, -`Series Code`, -`Country Code`) %>% 
  gather(-`Country Name`, key = "year", value = "beds.per.1000.inhabitants") %>% 
  mutate(beds.per.1000.inhabitants=as.numeric(beds.per.1000.inhabitants)) %>% 
  mutate(year=substring(year, 1, 4), year=as.numeric(year), year=as.factor(year)) %>% 
  rename(country=`Country Name`) %>% 
  mutate(country=as.factor(country))
```


```{r}
hospital.beds %>% 
  group_by(country) %>% 
  slice(-1)
```
